name: incense
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a substance that is burnt to produce a sweet smell, especially as part of a religious ceremony: an incense burner/stick

to cause someone to be extremely angry: The editor said a lot of readers would be incensed by my article on class. I was so incensed by what he was saying I had to walk out. Synonyms
